items.sentence: Tom said that he'd be able help me paint my shed tomorrow.
I asked Tom how many students were still in the classroom.
Tom is trying to find a place to live near where he works.
Tom was a junior high school student when I first met him.
Which of these two books would you recommend I read first?
How many babies have been born in this hospital this year?
The sunlight blinded Tom when he stepped out of the house.
The words above the door of the theatre were a metre high.
The topic is really interesting, but it's hard to discuss.
When Tom got Mary alone for a moment, he asked for a date.
I didn't find anything in that store that I wanted to buy.
I wonder whether or not Tom is really supposed to do that.
I found out something about Tom that I didn't know before.
Tom left an hour ago. The rest of us will be leaving soon.
I saw several fish swimming near the surface of the water.
I'll never be able to live up to my parents' expectations.
If the people decide to do something else, that's OK, too.
Mary has only ever had one other boyfriend other than Tom.
Most likely Tom would do that for you if you asked him to.
Tom would very likely do that for you if you asked him to.
